TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Combat or Movement Penalty for Crossing River
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No Combat or Movement Penalty for Crossing River
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]No Combat or Movement Penalty for Crossing River
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No Combat or Movement Penalty for Crossing River

TEXT.English: Founding a city has yielded %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD] from repurposing the infrastructure of the %s2_ImpName. The local people have been integrated into the new settlement as well, making the city start off with additional population.
TEXT.French: Founding a city has yielded %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD] from repurposing the infrastructure of the %s2_ImpName. The local people have been integrated into the new settlement as well, making the city start off with additional population.
TEXT.German: Die Gründung einer Stadt in der Nähe des/der %s2_ImpName hat %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD] durch die Verwertung der vorhandenen Infrastruktur eingebracht. Die lokale Bevölkerung wurde ebenfalls in die neue Siedlung integriert, wodurch die Stadt mit mehr Einwohnern anfängt.
TEXT.Italian: Founding a city has yielded %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD] from repurposing the infrastructure of the %s2_ImpName. The local people have been integrated into the new settlement as well, making the city start off with additional population.
TEXT.Spanish: Founding a city has yielded %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD] from repurposing the infrastructure of the %s2_ImpName. The local people have been integrated into the new settlement as well, making the city start off with additional population.

TEXT.English: %s1_CityName has revolted and is now independent!
TEXT.French: %s1_CityName has revolted and is now independent!
TEXT.German: Nach einer Revolte hat die Stadt %s1_CityName ihre Unabhaengigkeit erklaert!
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CityName has revolted and is now independent!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CityName has revolted and is now independent!

TEXT.German: Die Stadt %s1_CityName revoltiert und erklaert ihre Unabhaengigkeit!
